DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the effect of vitamin D supplementation in the form of Alfacalcidol on the the pulmonary function of adult asthmatic Egyptian patients
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Vitamin D Supplementation on the Pulmonary Functions of Adult Asthmatic Egyptian Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Asthmatic patients are recruited and divided into two groups. One receives Alfacalcidol beside their normal medications while the other acts as a control group receiving the normal asthma medication. Both groups are followed up for four months.
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients diagnosed with asthma 2. Nonsmokers 1. Liver impairment 2. Kidney impairment 3. Patients receiving digoxin 4.
